snippet: The marriages of gay men and lesbians who work for the United Nations Secretariat will be recognized by the organization if they have been wed in a jurisdiction where same-sex unions are legal.
abstract: United Nations Secretariat will recognize marriages of gay men and lesbians who work there if they have been wed in jurisdiction where such unions are legal; previously, secretariat deferred to laws of staff members' home countries.
lead_paragraph: The marriages of gay men and lesbians who work for the United Nations Secretariat will be recognized by the organization if they have been wed in a jurisdiction where same-sex unions are legal.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
